page.title: 12Tidy Tip
page.content: Oil can be recycled to be used for purposes such as heat in homes and in factories.Scrap metal can be recycled also and used for special purposes. But things like garden refuse cannot be used again. The things range from oil to garden waste. The most horrible thing that has been dumped was two kittens in a plastic bag and they would have been crushed but luckily someone heard them mioawing and they saved them. The rubbish is split into 4 different categories. These are scrap metal,hardcore and soil,house hold rubbish and garden refuse. There is also a bottle bank there but it is owned by Luton Borough Council. Some of the money goes to charity. All the rubbish at the weekend fills 5 extra skips.
